text: "Flight of the Bumblebee" is a musical composition by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov for solo violin and orchestra. It was written as an interlude for his opera, The Tale of Tsar Saltan (1899-1900). The music depicts the buzzing of a Bumblebee in its flight. It is a popular piece, especially with children, and is often played outside the opera as a concert piece. In 2019, Nintendo made an interpolation of the song for the battle royale videogame Tetris 99. it plays when there's only 10 players remaining in a game. Category:Compositions by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov Category:Orchestral works Category:Compositions in A minor
title: Flight of the Bumblebee
